languages.text: "Нашего брата пустотника не всякий пастырь поймет, вы ж понимаете. У нас иная жизнь, чем на планетах, иной уклад, порой даже язык иной. Пастве оно проще, когда с ними о Боге-Императоре говорит... свой".

"Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Нашего брата пустотника не всякий пастырь поймет, вы ж понимаете. У нас иная жизнь, чем на планетах, иной уклад, порой даже язык иной. Пастве оно проще, когда с ними о Боге-Императоре говорит... свой".

traits.locale_text: "Not every shepherd will understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different than those on planets, our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes we even speak a different language. The flock feel relieved when it is one of their own who talks to them about the Emperor."

"Not every shepherd will understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different than those on planets, our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes we even speak a different language. The flock feel relieved when it is one of their own who talks to them about the Emperor."

"Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

"Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

languages.text: "Nicht alle Prediger verstehen die Raumfahrer, müsst Ihr wissen. Unser Leben ist anders als das von Planetenbewohnern – unser Lebensstil ist fremdartig und merkwürdig. Manchmal sprechen wir sogar eine andere Sprache. Die Leute sind erleichtert, wenn sie mit einem der Ihren über den Gottimperator sprechen können."
languages.original_text: "Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht alle Prediger verstehen die Raumfahrer, müsst Ihr wissen. Unser Leben ist anders als das von Planetenbewohnern – unser Lebensstil ist fremdartig und merkwürdig. Manchmal sprechen wir sogar eine andere Sprache. Die Leute sind erleichtert, wenn sie mit einem der Ihren über den Imperator sprechen können."

languages.text: «No todos los predicadores entienden a los viajeros del vacío, ¿sabe? Nuestras vidas son muy diferentes a las de los habitantes de los planetas; les resultan ajenas e incomprensibles. A veces incluso hablamos un idioma distinto. La gente se siente aliviada cuando es uno de los suyos quien les habla del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «No todos los predicadores entienden a los viajeros del vacío, ¿sabe? Nuestras vidas son muy diferentes a las de los habitantes de los planetas; les resultan ajenas e incomprensibles. A veces incluso hablamos un idioma distinto. La gente se siente aliviada cuando es uno de los suyos quien les habla del Emperador».

languages.text: 「すべてのプリーチャーがヴォイズマンを理解できるわけではありません。私たちの生活は惑星に住む人たちとは違い、異質で変わっているのです。時には使う言葉が違うことだってある。自分たちの仲間が神帝陛下について話すとなると、人々は安心するのですよ」
languages.original_text: "Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてのプリーチャーがヴォイズマンを理解できるわけではありません。私たちの生活は惑星に住む人たちとは違い、異質で変わっているのです。時には使う言葉が違うことだってある。自分たちの仲間が皇帝について話すとなると、人々は安心するのですよ」

languages.text: “如您所见，并不是每位布道士都能理解我们这些船员。我们的生活与那些居住在行星上的人截然不同。我们的生活方式很陌生，很古怪，有时甚至连语言都不太一样。如果船上的告解神父能用我们自己熟悉的方式聊聊神皇的话，大家肯定会感到更轻松。”
languages.original_text: "Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “如您所见，并不是每位布道士都能理解我们这些船员。我们的生活与那些居住在行星上的人截然不同。我们的生活方式很陌生，很古怪，有时甚至连语言都不太一样。如果船上的告解牧师能用我们自己熟悉的方式聊聊帝皇的话，大家肯定会感到更轻松。”

languages.text: « Tous les prêcheurs ne sont pas aptes à comprendre les cosmomarins, vous savez. Notre mode de vie est bien différent de ce à quoi les habitants des planètes sont habitués. Parfois, il arrive même que nous ne parlions pas la même langue. Les gens se sentent davantage en confiance à l'idée que leur guide spirituel fasse partie des leurs. »
languages.original_text: "Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les prédicateurs ne sont pas aptes à comprendre les cosmomarins, vous savez. Notre mode de vie est bien différent de ce à quoi les habitants des planètes sont habitués. Parfois, il arrive même que nous ne parlions pas la même langue. Les gens se sentent davantage en confiance à l'idée que leur guide spirituel fasse partie des leurs. »

languages.text: "Uçsuz erlerini her vaiz anlayamaz gerçekten. Yaşamlarımız gezegenlerde ikamet edenlerden farklı. Bizim yaşam biçimimiz çok yabancı ve tuhaf. Bazen farklı bir dil bile konuşuyoruz. Kendi içlerinden birinin onlara Tanrı İmparator'dan bahsetmesi insanların içini rahatlatıyor."
languages.original_text: "Not every preacher can understand the voidsman, you see. Our lives are different from those dwelling on planets — our way of life is alien and strange. Sometimes, we even speak a different language. People feel relieved when it's one of their own who talks to them about the God-Emperor."
